short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On screen hotkeys for youtube, with ad fast-forwarding capabilities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On-screen hotkeys for YouTube. Enables fast forwarding YouTube ads and videos by simple clicking the top right portion of the video. Also enables skipping and backtracking 10 seconds with cursor.
